languages.text: "Бремя ответственности лежит на твоих плечах, элантах, но дух притупляется от утомления. Сбрось же оковы усталости".
"The burden of responsibility lies on your shoulders, elantach, and your soul grows dull from weariness. Break the chains of exhaustion."
languages.original_text: "Бремя ответственности лежит на твоих плечах, элантах, но дух притупляется от утомления. Сбрось же оковы усталости".

traits.locale_text: "The burden of responsibility lies on your shoulders, elantach, and your soul grows dull from exhaustion.Break the chains of exhaustion."
"The burden of responsibility lies on your shoulders, elantach, and your soul grows dull from exhaustion.Break the chains of exhaustion."
"The burden of responsibility lies on your shoulders, elantach, and your soul grows dull from weariness. Break the chains of exhaustion."
"The burden of responsibility lies on your shoulders, elantach, and your soul grows dull from weariness. Break the chains of exhaustion."
"The burden of responsibility lies on your shoulders, elantach, and your soul grows dull from weariness. Break the chains of exhaustion."

languages.text: “外界人，你的身上承担了太多的责任，你的灵魂因为劳累而黯然无光。快打破疲惫的枷锁。”
languages.original_text: "The burden of responsibility lies on your shoulders, elantach, and your soul grows dull from weariness. Break the chains of exhaustion."

traits.locale_text: “外界人，你的身上承担了太多的责任，你的灵魂因为劳累而黯然无光。快打破疲惫的枷锁。”

languages.text: «El peso de la responsabilidad recae sobre tus hombros, elantach, y tu alma se atenúa debido a la fatiga. Rompe las cadenas del agotamiento».
languages.original_text: "The burden of responsibility lies on your shoulders, elantach, and your soul grows dull from weariness. Break the chains of exhaustion."

traits.locale_text: «El peso de la responsabilidad recae sobre tus hombros, elantach, y tu alma se atenúa debido a la fatiga. Rompe las cadenas del agotamiento».

languages.text: « Le fardeau des responsabilités pèse sur vos épaules, elantach, et votre âme s'affaiblit sous son poids. Brisez les chaînes de l'épuisement. »
languages.original_text: "The burden of responsibility lies on your shoulders, elantach, and your soul grows dull from weariness. Break the chains of exhaustion."

traits.locale_text: « Le fardeau des responsabilités pèse sur vos épaules, elantach, et votre âme s'affaiblit sous son poids. Brisez les chaînes de l'épuisement. »

languages.text: "Die Bürde der Verantwortung lastet auf Euren Schultern, Elantach, und Eure Seele wird stumpf vor Müdigkeit. Durchbrecht die Ketten der Erschöpfung."
languages.original_text: "The burden of responsibility lies on your shoulders, elantach, and your soul grows dull from weariness. Break the chains of exhaustion."

traits.locale_text: "Die Bürde der Verantwortung lastet auf Euren Schultern, Elantach, und Eure Seele wird stumpf vor Müdigkeit. Durchbrecht die Ketten der Erschöpfung."

languages.text: 「エランタよ、責任の重荷はあなたの肩に伸し掛かかっていて、お前の魂は消耗して鈍くなっている。疲弊の鎖を断ち切りるのだ」
languages.original_text: "The burden of responsibility lies on your shoulders, elantach, and your soul grows dull from weariness. Break the chains of exhaustion."

traits.locale_text: 「エランタよ、責任の重荷はあなたの肩に伸し掛かかっていて、お前の魂は消耗して鈍くなっている。疲弊の鎖を断ち切りるのだ」

languages.text: "Sorumluluklarının yükü, omzuna ağır geliyor elantach. Ruhun yorgunluktan durgunlaşıyor. Yorgunluk zincirlerini kır."
languages.original_text: "The burden of responsibility lies on your shoulders, elantach, and your soul grows dull from weariness. Break the chains of exhaustion."

traits.locale_text: "Sorumluluklarının yükü omzuna ağır geliyor elantach, ruhun yorgunluktan durgunlaşıyor. Yorgunluk zincirlerini kır."
